org.cast.cwm.xml.transform
Interface IDOMTransformer

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnsureUniqueWicketIds, FilterElements, GlossaryTransformer, TransformChain, XslTransformer
public interface IDOMTransformer

Classes implementing this interface can modify an Element. IDOMTransformers can be added through XmlSection#addPreTransformer(IDOMTransformer) and XmlSection#addPostTransformer(IDOMTransformer). #applyTransform(Node) will then be called at the appropriate time. TODO update doc

Method Summary
 Element applyTransform(Element n, TransformParameters params)
          Apply the transform to the given element.
 org.apache.wicket.util.time.Time getLastModified(TransformParameters params)
          Return the last time this transformer was modified, or null if it is immutable.
 

Method Detail

applyTransform

Element applyTransform(Element n,
                       TransformParameters params)
Apply the transform to the given element.

Parameters:

Returns:
the transformed element

getLastModified

org.apache.wicket.util.time.Time getLastModified(TransformParameters params)
Return the last time this transformer was modified, or null if it is immutable. For a transformer based on an XSLT stylesheet, for instance, this would be the last modified time of that file.

Parameters:
params - this can be null
Returns:
